title: Ralph hangs when all stories blocked + auto-unblock not triggered
description: Two issues: 1) Ralph doesn't exit/notify when 0 pending and all blocked. 2) Auto-unblock doesn't fire when Kiro completes stories (JSON updated directly, not via completeStory())

acceptanceCriteria.text: Fix runner to detect 'all blocked' state and exit gracefully
Send ntfy notification when PRD is blocked (not just complete)
Add startup scan: check all blocked stories, unblock if blocker is completed
Test: complete a blocker, verify dependent auto-unblocks on next iteration
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: fix: BUG-007 ralph hang on all-blocked + auto-unblock scan
